title: Patch Arm binary with Ida
content:
In Ida I can patch binary that run on x86 , but not binary that run on Arm.

How can I simply patch binary , change assembly(not only hex) and save to new binary file

answers_data.content: Keypatch is a plugin for IDA that uses keystone to assemble instructions for patching. It supports ARM. Once you've patched the IDB you can go to Edit -> Patch Program -> Apply Patches to Input File
